alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 07 at 2:42PM AKST until January 10 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Buildings could be damaged. Travel could be difficult. Blowing snow could cause areas of low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong and gusty northeast winds are expected to develop late Saturday and continue into late Sunday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
